Detailed Description

Make the sinogram.

Author:
antonmx <antonmx@gmail.com>
Date:
Mon Jul 21 10:09:31 2008

Main file for the program which reads the list of files forming the array of CT projections, picks one specified line from each of the and prepares the sinogram from these lines.

Todo:
Add possibility to make vertical sinograms.
